540:1: atha khalu saṃjñeyo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiraṣṭāviṃśatibhirmahāyakṣasenāpatibhiḥ sārdhamutthāyāsanādekāṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat |
540:2: ayaṃ bhadanta bhagavansuvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarāja etarhi cānagate'dhvani yatra grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade vā janapadapradeśe vāraṇyāyatane vā girikandare vā rājakule vā gṛhe vā pracariṣyati |
540:3: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavansaṃjñeyo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ sārdhamaṣṭāviṃśati bhirmahāyakṣasenāpatibhistatra grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade vāraṇye vā girikandare vā rājakule vopasaṃkramiṣyāmi |
540:4: adṛśyamānenātmabhāvena tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣo rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi |
540:5: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ śāntisvaratyayanaṃ kariṣyami |
540:6: teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ dharmaśravaṇikānāṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ yeṣāṃ keṣāṃciditaḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādantaśa ekā catuṣpādikāpi gāthā śrutā bhavedantaśa ekapadamapi suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādekabodhisattvanāmadheyamapi śrutaṃ bhavedudgṛhītaṃ vaikatathāgatanāmadheyaṃ vāntaśaścāsya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhavedudgṛhītaṃ vā teṣāṃ sarveṣāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi |
540:7: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ ca kariṣyāmi |
540:8: teṣāṃ ca kulānāṃ teṣāṃ ca gṛhāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca nagarāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca grāmāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca nigamānāṃ teṣāṃ cāraṇyānāṃ teṣāṃ ca rājakulānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi |
540:9: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmi ||
540:21: acintyo me bhadanta bhagavansarvadharmeṣu jñānaviṣayaḥ pravartate |
540:22: yathā ca me bhadanta bhagavansarvadharmāḥ samamyagjñātāḥ |
540:24: tena hetunā mama bhadanta bhagavansaṃjñeyasya mahāyakṣasenāpateḥ saṃjñeya iti nāmadheyaṃ samudapādi ||
540:27: mahāntaṃ ca tasya sthāma ca balaṃ vīryaṃ ca kāye saṃjanayiṣyāmi |
540:31: yathā ca sa dharmabhāṇako na klāntakāyo bhavet |
540:34: yenāyaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarājasteṣāṃ buddhasahasrāvaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya ciraṃ jambudvīpe pracaret |
